name: Sacrificial Sword
desc: A ceremonial sword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Fetters of the Dandelion Gladiator
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
It's a human thing to exaggerate a hero's story, even to the point of elevating the fetters that once bound the hero to the level of an enemy of true freedom.
As a result, these fetters were granted extraordinary powers.

materials.name: Chaos Device
materials.desc: Comes from ancient defunct relic structures. A part that once held the structure together. Its aesthetically-pleasing engineering is quite exquisite.

materials.name: Divining Scroll
materials.desc: A scroll that likely relates to some kind of magic. Exudes an inexplicable but ominous warmth.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Chains of the Dandelion Gladiator
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The chains that once bound the great hero Vennessa. In truth, all gladiators would have worn chains in that era, and Vennessa was but one of many.

materials.name: Chaos Device
materials.desc: Comes from ancient defunct relic structures. A part that once held the structure together. Its aesthetically-pleasing engineering is quite exquisite.

materials.name: Divining Scroll
materials.desc: A scroll that likely relates to some kind of magic. Exudes an inexplicable but ominous warmth.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Chains of the Dandelion Gladiator
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The chains that once bound the great hero Vennessa. In truth, all gladiators would have worn chains in that era, and Vennessa was but one of many.

materials.name: Chaos Circuit
materials.desc: Comes from ancient defunct relic structures. Was once a logic circuit responsible for movement functions. Sadly, no one is able to make sense of how it worked.

materials.name: Sealed Scroll
materials.desc: An old scroll lacking in detail and clarity. By following the images on it, some magical creatures can recreate a small part of its magic.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Shackles of the Dandelion Gladiator
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Vennessa was not truly bound by her chains. If she had so wished, no ordinary physical constraints forged in Mondstadt could have held her, for the land there yielded no ore of exceptional quality, nor did it possess the divine flame of her ancestral home.
She was only bound by her responsibility to take care of her tribespeople.

materials.name: Chaos Circuit
materials.desc: Comes from ancient defunct relic structures. Was once a logic circuit responsible for movement functions. Sadly, no one is able to make sense of how it worked.

materials.name: Sealed Scroll
materials.desc: An old scroll lacking in detail and clarity. By following the images on it, some magical creatures can recreate a small part of its magic.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Shackles of the Dandelion Gladiator
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Vennessa was not truly bound by her chains. If she had so wished, no ordinary physical constraints forged in Mondstadt could have held her, for the land there yielded no ore of exceptional quality, nor did it possess the divine flame of her ancestral home.
She was only bound by her responsibility to take care of her tribespeople.

materials.name: Chaos Core
materials.desc: Comes from ancient defunct relic structures. The core that once drove a mechanical beast. Should you come to understand its workings and reproduce it, you could perhaps change the world.

materials.name: Forbidden Curse Scroll
materials.desc: A scroll inscribed with ancient images. It is said that few can decipher its meaning, and the few scholars that have all went mad.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Dream of the Dandelion Gladiator
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Vennessa may have been freed from slavery, but she then found herself subject to many other, even greater forms of bondage. What began as a duty to her tribespeople extended to all of Mondstadt, then to the concept of freedom itself, and beyond a point even to the whole world.
What she really hoped for, in truth, was that the world might grow stronger.

materials.name: Chaos Core
materials.desc: Comes from ancient defunct relic structures. The core that once drove a mechanical beast. Should you come to understand its workings and reproduce it, you could perhaps change the world.

materials.name: Forbidden Curse Scroll
materials.desc: A scroll inscribed with ancient images. It is said that few can decipher its meaning, and the few scholars that have all went mad.

customize.name: Sacrificial Sword
customize.desc: A ceremonial sword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

customize.text: is available from all Character Event Wishes and Weapon Event Wishes, even when it is not a featured Weapon with a boosted drop-rate.

customize.name: A Thousand Blazing Suns
customize.desc: A greatsword that dazzles like the rising sun. It has witnessed the extinguishing and rekindling of innumerable suns.

customize.name: Starcaller's Watch
customize.desc: A statue carved in the shape of an eagle, a sacred relic of the Masters of the Night-Wind that has been passed down from generation to generation.

customize.name: The Stringless
customize.desc: A bow that once served as an extraordinary instrument. It is no longer capable of getting people up and dancing.

customize.name: Sacrificial Sword
customize.desc: A ceremonial sword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

customize.name: Favonius Codex
customize.desc: A secret tome that belonged to the scholars of the Knights of Favonius. It describes the logic and power of elements and matter.

customize.name: Favonius Lance
customize.desc: A polearm made in the style of the Knights of Favonius. Its shaft is straight, and its tip flows lightly like the wind.

customize.name: Lithic Blade
customize.desc: A greatsword carved and chiseled from the very bedrock of Liyue.

customize.name: Fang of the Mountain King
customize.desc: A giant sword forged from pure turquoise. Due to its greater weight than most ordinary weapons, it was named for Kongomato the Mountain King.

customize.name: Engulfing Lightning
customize.desc: A naginata used to "cut grass." Any army that stands before this weapon will probably be likewise cut down...

customize.name: Sacrificial Bow
customize.desc: A ceremonial hunting bow that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

customize.name: Sacrificial Sword
customize.desc: A ceremonial sword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

customize.name: The Widsith
customize.desc: A heavy notebook filled with musical scores. Though suffering from moth damage and heavy wear-and-tear, there is still much power to be found among the hand-written words within.

customize.name: Favonius Lance
customize.desc: A polearm made in the style of the Knights of Favonius. Its shaft is straight, and its tip flows lightly like the wind.

customize.name: Rainslasher
customize.desc: A fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge that crushes enemies with brute force and raw power.

customize.name: Absolution
customize.desc: A rapier once wielded by a deceiver who had forsaken everything. In the past, it was primarily used as a tool when he had to disguise his identity.

customize.name: Light of Foliar Incision
customize.desc: The gilded blade was made using precious white branches. It was once used to destroy countless poisons that infested the forest.

customize.name: The Stringless
customize.desc: A bow that once served as an extraordinary instrument. It is no longer capable of getting people up and dancing.

customize.name: Sacrificial Sword
customize.desc: A ceremonial sword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

customize.name: Sacrificial Fragments
customize.desc: A weathered script, the text of which is no longer legible. A cursed item eroded by the winds of time.

customize.name: Lithic Spear
customize.desc: A spear forged from the rocks of the Guyun Stone Forest. Its hardness knows no equal.

customize.name: Sacrificial Greatsword
customize.desc: A ceremonial greatsword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

customize.name: Splendor of Tranquil Waters
customize.desc: A scepter around which swirls pure water. In days long past, it once symbolized the highest authority over the seas.

customize.name: Jadefall's Splendor
customize.desc: A ritual vessel carved from jade that reflects the luster of the skies and the clear waters.

customize.name: The Bell
customize.desc: A heavy greatsword. A clock is embedded within it, though its internal mechanisms have long been damaged.

customize.name: The First Great Magic
customize.desc: A stage prop once used by a past "Great Magician." Its final secret was that it was also a weapon beyond the pale.

customize.name: Aqua Simulacra
customize.desc: This longbow's color is unpredictable. Under the light, it takes on a lustrous, watery blue.

customize.desc: A keenly honed weapon forged from some strange crystal. Its faint blue light seems to whisper of countless matters now past.

desc.text:
On the cliff facing the eastern sea, the ancestors worshiped the masters of Time and Anemo together.
The two are intimately related, as expressed in the saying, "Anemo brings stories while Time nurtures them."
This sword tells the story of protection to show the courage to protect.
Originally just a prop, its blade was sharpened by the passage of time.
This sword once belonged to the kindly Gunnhildr Clan.
In sacrificial ceremonies, they would enact the defense of Mondstadt.
There were three acts in the ceremony dedicated to the winds of time.
The final act told a tale of the protection of Mondstadt, of life, and of freedom.
The ceremony and its history have now been lost.
But the Gunnhildr Clan continues to act as guardians of Mondstadt to this day.

value.text: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a <color=#37ffff>40%/50%/60%/70%/80%</color> chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every <color=#37ffff>30/26/22s/19/16s</color> .

value.name: Sacrificial Sword
value.desc:
Composed: Sacrificial Sword

This blade was just a prop before its blade was sharpened by the passage of time.
